static F3::send ( $  file,
$  kbps = 0,
$  partial = TRUE 
) [static]

Transmit a file for downloading by HTTP client; If kilobytes per second is specified, output is throttled (bandwidth will not be controlled by default); Return TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise; Support for partial downloads is indicated by third argument
